flawed_nl_solution:
On Tuesday, 120 books were taken out 250 - 120 = <<250-120=160>>160 books
On Wednesday, 35 books were returned 160 + 35 = <<160+35=195>>195 books
On Thursday, 15 books were borrowed 195 - 15 = 180 books
#### 180

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 130, not 160. It appears there was a miscalculation with the digits before the final zero.
